title: User Authentication with Valid Credentials
description: Verify that a user can successfully log in using valid credentials through the Supabase authentication system and that the session persists across page reloads.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter valid username/email and password.
Click the login button.
Verify the user is logged in successfully and redirected to the dashboard.
Refresh the page.
Verify the session persists and user remains logged in.

title: User Authentication with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify that the system correctly handles login attempts with incorrect username/email or password and prevents access.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page.
Enter invalid username/email or password.
Click the login button.
Verify an error message is displayed indicating invalid credentials.
Verify user remains on login page and is not authenticated.

title: Create Traditional Front/Back Flashcard
description: Verify user can create a traditional flashcard with distinct front and back content using the rich text editor with advanced formatting.

steps.description: Navigate to the flashcard creation page.
Select 'Traditional Front/Back' flashcard type.
Input formatted text with images on front side using BlockNote editor.
Input formatted text with images on back side using BlockNote editor.
Save the flashcard.
Verify the flashcard is created and stored correctly with all formatting and images preserved.

title: Create Quote-Based Flashcard with Automatic Front/Back Separation
description: Verify the system automatically separates front and back content when creating a flashcard using quote blocks in the rich text editor.

steps.description: Open flashcard creation and select 'Quote-Based' type.
Enter rich text containing at least two quote blocks, representing front and back.
Save the flashcard.
Verify the system automatically separates content into front and back using the quote blocks.
Verify the flashcard renders correctly displaying front content first and back content on flip.

title: Create Word-Hiding Flashcard with Syntax Highlighting
description: Verify creation of word-hiding flashcards where specific words are hidden based on syntax, and that hidden words toggle visibility during study.

steps.description: Navigate to flashcard creation and select 'Word-Hiding' type.
Input sentence with words marked using the required syntax for hiding.
Save the flashcard.
Verify the flashcard hides marked words during study.
During study, toggle visibility of hidden words.
Verify the hidden words are shown and hidden correctly when toggled.

title: Create True/False Flashcard with Optional Explanation
description: Verify user can create a true/false flashcard and add an optional explanation that is displayed after answer submission.

steps.description: Navigate to flashcard creation and select 'True/False' flashcard type.
Enter a statement and select correct answer true or false.
Optionally add a detailed explanation.
Save the flashcard.
Verify the flashcard is saved with statement, correct answer, and explanation present.
During study, answer the flashcard.
Verify feedback is given and explanation is shown after answer submission.

title: Hierarchical Flashcard Parent-Child Creation and Navigation
description: Verify the creation of hierarchical flashcards supporting parent-child relationships and that navigation between parent and child flashcards works as expected.

steps.description: Create a parent flashcard with appropriate content.
Create one or more child flashcards linked to the parent.
Verify child flashcards are correctly associated in hierarchy.
From parent flashcard view, navigate to child flashcard.
Verify navigation displays the correct child flashcard content.
Navigate back to parent flashcard.
Verify parent flashcard content is displayed correctly.

title: Deck Creation with Custom Colors and Statistics
description: Verify user can create thematic decks with custom colors and that each deck displays correct per-deck statistics.

steps.description: Navigate to deck management page.
Create a new deck, selecting a custom color.
Verify deck is created with chosen color.
Add flashcards to this deck.
Verify deck statistics update correctly reflecting flashcard count and study progress.

title: Rich Text Note Creation and Automatic Flashcard Conversion
description: Verify users can create rich text notes including images and formatting, and can convert notes into appropriate flashcard types automatically.

steps.description: Navigate to notes creation page.
Create a note containing rich text, images, and multiple paragraphs.
Click the 'Convert to Flashcards' option.
Verify the system converts note content into flashcards with correct types based on detected content.
Verify generated flashcards preserve formatting and images appropriately.

title: FSRS Algorithm Scheduling and Review State Updates
description: Verify that flashcards are scheduled correctly for review according to the FSRS algorithm including automatic updating of review states and due dates after study response and difficulty rating.

steps.description: Initiate a study session with flashcards due for review.
Respond to flashcard answering.
Rate difficulty level of the flashcard.
Verify FSRS algorithm updates flashcard's next review date and difficulty level accordingly.
Complete multiple sessions and verify scheduling changes.
Verify flashcards appear again according to updated due dates.

title: Real-Time Study Interface with Timer and Feedback
description: Verify that the study interface displays a timer, supports focused study mode, provides instant correctness feedback, and correctly tracks study session timing.

steps.description: Start a study session.
Verify the timer starts counting immediately.
Answer several flashcards.
Verify feedback is displayed instantly showing whether answer was correct or incorrect.
Toggle focused study mode on.
Verify UI changes reflecting focused mode with minimal distractions.
Complete session and check recorded session time.
Verify the study session time reflects the actual duration accurately.

title: Study Progress Analytics and Interactive Dashboard
description: Verify that the analytics dashboard correctly displays accuracy rates, response times, progress per deck, study calendar with streaks, and FSRS metrics charts updating in real-time with user activity.

steps.description: Complete multiple study sessions with varying flashcards across different decks.
Navigate to the analytics dashboard.
Verify accuracy rate statistics reflect user answers.
Verify response time charts show average answer times.
Verify progress by individual deck is shown correctly.
Verify study calendar displays correct streaks and session dates.
Verify FSRS metrics charts are updated according to study data.

title: Notes Timeline View and Flashcard Synchronization
description: Verify that the notes system timeline view correctly displays note history and that edits synchronize properly with linked flashcards.

steps.description: Create and save multiple rich text notes.
Convert some notes into flashcards.
Open notes timeline view.
Verify timeline correctly reflects note creation and edit history.
Edit note content that has linked flashcards.
Verify linked flashcards update to reflect note changes.

title: Role-Level Security and Input Validation
description: Verify that database row-level security (RLS) prevents unauthorized data access and that all user inputs in flashcards, notes, and profile are validated and sanitized to prevent injection and errors.

steps.description: Attempt to access or modify flashcards or notes of another user through the UI and API.
Verify access is denied and no unauthorized data is exposed.
Input invalid or malicious content (scripts, overly large text, malformed data) into flashcard and note creation forms.
Verify inputs are sanitized, errors are shown, and no security breach or crash occurs.

title: Responsive UI Across Browsers and Devices
description: Verify that the application UI is fully responsive and accessible on supported desktop browsers and mobile devices, maintaining usability and appearance.

steps.description: Open the application in various desktop browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge) and different screen resolutions.
Verify UI components render correctly without layout issues.
Open the application on different mobile devices and browsers.
Verify all interactive elements are accessible, screens scale properly, and no content is truncated or overlaps.

title: Performance Testing with Lazy Loading and Caching
description: Validate performance optimizations by testing the system behavior when loading large numbers of flashcards and notes, ensuring smooth scrolling, lazy loading, and effective caching without UI freezes.

steps.description: Populate user account with large number (>1000) of flashcards and notes.
Navigate through flashcard lists, notes timeline, and dashboard.
Verify lazy loading triggers appropriately, only loading visible items initially.
Verify UI remains responsive with no lag or freezes.
Repeat accesses to data and measure caching effect.
Verify subsequent loads are faster due to caching and memoization.
